name: Haley

topics.topic_text: I wanted to talk about you, Haley.
topics.response_text: There's not much to tell. What do you want to know?
No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.
The swamp folk, mostly. I guess they don't bother me none because I was born here.

topics.topic_text: So, how long have you had this store?
topics.response_text: Oh, you're thinking... no, no. It's not a family thing. I took the name of the store when I found this place a couple years ago.

topics.topic_text: Where do you get your stock from?
topics.response_text: I found some of it. Some was here when I got here. I get some from them smugglers.
Sure thing. Are you here to buy something?
No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.

topics.topic_text: Can you repair some things for me?
topics.response_text: Sure as a swamp folk's head is squishy.

topics.topic_text: Show me what you have for sale.

topics.response_text: Well, hello there! Welcome to... uh... welcome to Haley's Hardware! Where we have... hard... ware...

conversation.response_text: Be careful out there. Them swamp folk is nasty.
I also can do repairs, if'n you need it.

description:
Haley is a 45 year-old African American Male.

A middle-aged African American man who runs a small hardware shop in the ruins of D.C. Haley suffers from amnesia, with his earliest clear memory dating back to 2275 when he woke up in the run-down shop he now owns. Despite his memory loss, he has adapted to life in the wasteland and established himself as a reliable merchant and repairman.

Haley's Personality: Pragmatic and adaptable, Haley has made peace with his mysterious past and focuses on the present. He's a shrewd businessman but maintains a neutral stance, willing to trade with anyone who has something of value. He's particularly cautious but respectful when dealing with the local swampfolk, who have somehow come to trust him despite their usual hostility to outsiders.

Haley's Backstory: Haley's past is a mystery to himself and others. His earliest memory is from 2275, when he awoke in a derelict hardware store with no recollection of his life before that point. The store was already stocked with pre-War goods, and he took the name 'Haley' from the faded signage outside. Over time, he repaired what he could and set up shop as a merchant. Despite his amnesia, he has learned enough about the wasteland to survive and even developed an unusual understanding with the local swampfolk, who leave him undisturbed when they visit his shop, likely due to his willingness to trade food with them.
